import { useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; let INITIAL = { "username": localStorage.getItem("username"), "balance": 0.00, "account_id": "0000000000", "account_type": "checkings", "goal": 0.00 } function AddGoal({ sendData }) { let navigate = useNavigate() const [formData, setFormData] = useState(INITIAL); const handleChange = evt => { const { name, value } = evt.target; setFormData(fData => ({ ...fData, [name]: value })); } function submitForm(event) { event.preventDefault() sendData(formData) navigate.pushState("/user") } return (

Account

) } export default AddGoal;
